title: One hurt in shooting range accident
content:
MANNINGTON, W.Va. (WDTV) - One person was treated for a gunshot wound after an accident at a shooting range in Mannington.
According to the Marion County Sheriff's Department, the accident happened at the Dent's Run Shooting Range just after 10:00 Thursday morning.
A man was unloading his gun when he accidentally pulled the trigger too soon and shot himself in the hand.
The man's injuries were not life-threatening and he was taken to Fairmont Regional Medical Center for treatment.
